name: xraylib

pre_pr_migrator_status.python39:
not solvable: ['Encountered problems while solving.
Problem: nothing provides openssl >=1.0.2p,<1.0.3a needed by python-2.7.15-h938d71a_1006
', 'Encountered problems while solving.
Problem: package numpy-1.16.0-py27_blas_openblash1522bff_1000 requires python >=2.7,<2.8.0a0, but none of the providers can be installed
', 'Encountered problems while solving.
Problem: package numpy-1.16.0-py27_blas_openblash4251c03_1000 requires python >=2.7,<2.8.0a0, but none of the providers can be installed

Problem: package numpy-1.16.2-py27hde85f9e_1 requires python >=2.7,<2.8.0a0, but none of the providers can be installed

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4.1.3" %}

package:
  name: xraylib
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: http://lvserver.ugent.be/xraylib/xraylib-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f280788e9d2d730a01c1031f41233d9926b67c89e4f3fdd7f43f408bb0d24770
  patches:
    - meson-cython.patch

build:
  number: 3
  ignore_run_exports_from:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('xraylib', max_pin='x') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}     # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - python                                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - numpy                                  # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - pkg-config  # [unix]
    - cython
    # see https://github.com/mesonbuild/meson/issues/10737
    - meson <0.63
    - ninja
    - swig
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}  # [unix and not arm64]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}  # [win]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - numpy
  run:
    - python
    - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
    - ucrt  # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/xraylib/xraylib.mod  # [unix]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_INC%\\xraylib\\xraylib.mod exit 1  # [win]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_LIB%\\pkgconfig\\libxrl.pc exit 1  # [win]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_LIB%\\xrl.lib exit 1  # [win]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_INC%\\xraylib\\xraylib.h exit 1  # [win]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_BIN%\\xrl-11.dll exit 1  # [win]
  imports:
    - xraylib
    - xraylib_np

about:
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: license_all.txt
  home: https://github.com/tschoonj/xraylib/wiki
  summary: A library for X-ray matter interaction cross sections for X-ray fluorescence applications

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ericdill
    - tacaswell
    - licode
    - tschoonj
    - CJ-Wright
    - mrakitin
